The company management includes Kumar Mangalam Birla - Chairman, Lalit Naik - Managing Director, Sushil Agarwal - WholeTime Director & CFO, Tarjani Vakil - Independent Director, P Murari - Independent Director, B R Gupta - Independent Director, G P Gupta - Independent Director, S C Bhargava - Independent Director, B L Shah - Non Executive Director, Rajashree Birla - Non Executive Director, T Chattopadhyay - Ind.Dire & Nominee Director.
